title: Acknowledgment of Reviewers
abstract: On behalf of the editors of Clinical Microbiology Reviews (CMR), I gratefully acknowledge the following individuals, who served as reviewers for the journal during November 2018 through October 2019. Their time and effort in reviewing manuscripts are essential to ensuring the high quality of our publications, and their help is greatly appreciated. Mohamed Abdel-Mohsen Kevin Alby Jonathan Alpern Anwar Anwar-Mohamed Maiken Cavling Arendrup David S. Askew Gayle C. Baldwin Jeffrey A. Banas Michelle A. Barron Suzanne S.
